data.title: AppleÂ TV (NO)
data.meta_description: An overachiever finds herself working a low level job reporting to a former high school classmate.
data.text:
EPISODE 101

Episode 1

Anticipating her first ever promotion, Zhong Yu Tang gets the shock of her life when her childhood classmate, who had always had the lowest grades in the class, is introduced as the new CEO

1 hr 14 min Â· 18 Feb 2016

EPISODE 102

Episode 2

Zhong Yu Tang tries to make the best of her situation and tries to rally Sales Team C to be better. Wen Kai is determined to get back at Yu Tang for all the mean things she did to him when they were kids

1 hr 14 min Â· 18 Feb 2016

EPISODE 103

Episode 3

When Jia Yin's son is sick, Yu Tang steps up to help her out and learns about Jia Yin's family. Wen Kai agrees to help Yu Tang learn how to be a saleswoman

1 hr 13 min Â· 18 Feb 2016

EPISODE 104

Episode 4

Wen Kai figures out how Yu Tang managed to save the Mei Mei contract with Di Shi Kang. Yu Tang manages to convince Sales Team C to put some effort into the Yours project

1 hr 13 min Â· 18 Feb 2016

EPISODE 105

Episode 5

Wen Kai takes care of Yu Tang after she falls into his pool, and then Yu Tang takes care of him when he gets sick. Wen Kai is jealous when Yu Tang meets another man for breakfast

1 hr 14 min Â· 18 Feb 2016
